If the target takes damage of the chosen type while under the effects of this spell, they can choose to negate that damage completely. This spell ends if the target is knocked {@condition unconscious}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can choose one additional damage type for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Word Of Inspiration
entries: You speak encouraging words that ignite the spark of creativity within a creature of your choice within range. The target feels inspired, leading to bursts of creativity that manifest as random ideas or insights relevant to their skills or situation.
Target: One creature you can see within range.
Saving Throw: The target must make a Wisdom saving throw.

On a failed save: The target gains inspiration and rolls a {@dice d6}. For the duration of the spell, they can add this {@dice d6} to one ability check or attack roll they make. They can decide to use this inspiration after seeing the roll but before any effects of the roll occur. Additionally, the target might experience a random idea or flash of creativity, as determined by the DM.
On a successful save: The target is unaffected but does not suffer any negative effects.

spell.name: Word Of Joy
entries: Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 feet
Components: V (Verbal)
Duration: {@status Concentration|XPHB}, up to 1 minute
Effect:
You speak calming and uplifting words to a creature of your choice within range, implanting a joyfuzz loop in their mind that suppresses discomfort and enhances their mood.
Target: One creature you can see within range.
Saving Throw: The target must make a Wisdom saving throw.

On a failed save: The target gains advantage on all saving throws against being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed} for the duration. However, they also have disadvantage on all Intelligence-based ability checks and saving throws due to reduced consciousness.
On a successful save: The target is unaffected.
Aftermath:

The effects of the joyfuzz loop last as long as you maintain {@status Concentration|XPHB}. If {@status Concentration|XPHB} is broken, the target's mood will return to normal, and they will no longer have the advantages or disadvantages granted by this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a 2nd-level or higher slot, the duration increases by 1 minute for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Word Of Love
entries: You speak passionately about a creature’s romantic virtues, using psychic suggestion to implant romantic desire in a listener of your choice within range. This powerful suggestion causes the listener to develop romantic feelings toward the target.
Target: One creature you can see within range.
Saving Throw: The target must make a Wisdom saving throw.

On a failed save: The target becomes {@condition charmed} by the subject of your words. For the duration, they regard the target as a romantic interest, experiencing a strong attraction that significantly increases their opinion of the target.
On a successful save: The target is unaffected.
Effects of Being {@condition Charmed|XPHB}:
While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target will:
Be more inclined to make romantic advances toward the target.
Have a +5 bonus to Charisma checks made to influence the target's opinion or to propose marriage.
The feelings implanted by this spell last until the end of the duration or until the target is harmed by the {@condition charmed} creature, at which point the charm ends immediately.

spell.name: Word Of Pain
entries: You induce intense pain in a creature you can see within range, targeting their pain centers and overstimulating their nerve endings. The target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier). On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} psychic damage and suffers the following effects for the duration:
The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
The target cannot regain hit points.
On a successful save, the target takes half damage and suffers no additional effects.
Psychic Sensitivity: If the target is psychically sensitive, they take {@damage 4d8} psychic damage instead of {@dice 3d8}, and the effects last for 1 additional round beyond the initial duration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a higher-level psionic slot:
4th level: The damage increases to {@damage 4d8} psychic damage.
5th level: The damage increases to {@damage 5d8} psychic damage, and the target must make an additional Constitution saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

spell.name: Word Of Productivity

components.m: (a small token symbolizing hard work, such as a hammer or worn tool)

entries: You inspire a creature within range, filling their mind with motivational energy and accelerating their body’s metabolic processes to extraordinary levels. The creature can choose to accept or reject this gift. If accepted, the target gains the following benefits for the next 8 hours:
Frenzied Focus: The target gains advantage on all ability checks related to physical labor, crafting, or mundane tasks (such as building, repairing, or cooking).
Unstoppable Drive: The target can ignore the effects of {@condition exhaustion} while the power lasts, though they still accumulate levels of {@condition exhaustion} as normal.
Metabolic Boost: The target’s movement speed increases by 10 feet for the duration.
After the power ends, the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a success, they shake off the fatigue. On a failure, they gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When cast using a higher-level psionic slot, the target gains greater endurance:
3rd level: The duration increases to 24 hours.
4th level: The movement speed bonus increases to 15 feet, and the {@condition exhaustion} save DC is reduced to 10.
5th level: The target automatically succeeds on the {@condition exhaustion} save and gains temporary HP equal to your Intelligence modifier at the start of the effect.

spell.name: Word Of Progress
entries: You speak a word of motivation that resonates with the target's desire for improvement. Choose one creature within range. For the duration, the target gains a +2 bonus to their next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw. Additionally, if the target is working on a task involving technology, they can complete it twice as fast while benefiting from this spell.
If the target fails to use this spell's benefit before the spell ends, they can choose to reroll any single roll made before the spell expires.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Word Of Protection
entries: You invoke psychic noise to bolster a creature within range, enhancing their durability and resistance to damage. Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, that creature gains the following benefits:
Damage Resistance: The target gains resistance to one damage type of your choice (bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, fire, cold, lightning, acid, or poison).
Temporary Hit Points: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier at the start of each of their turns.
Psychic Fortitude: The target has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed}.
If the target is psychically sensitive, the duration increases to 8 hours, and they gain resistance to two damage types of your choice.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a higher-level psionic slot:
5th level: The duration increases to 8 hours without requiring {@status Concentration|XPHB}.
6th level: The temporary hit points increase to twice your Intelligence modifier at the start of each turn.
7th level: You can target an additional creature within range for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Word Of Serenity
entries: You speak soothing words and employ psychic suggestion to help end a mental break in a creature of your choice within range. The calming influence provides immediate relief but also induces a brief psychic sleep.
Target: One creature (or animal) that is currently experiencing a mental break.
Saving Throw: The target must make a Wisdom saving throw.

On a failed save: The target is calmed and enters a state of psychic sleep for 1 minute. During this time, they are {@condition unconscious} and cannot be awoken except by a spell or effect that ends the {@condition unconscious} condition. However, they automatically stabilize if they are dying.
On a successful save: The target is unaffected and remains in their current state.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a 3rd-level or higher slot, you can affect one additional target for each slot level above 2nd, provided they are within range and experiencing a mental break.

spell.name: Word Of Trust

components.m: (an object the target associates with hope or trust, such as a letter or personal item)

entries: You subtly influence the mind of a {@condition restrained} or willing creature, speaking with soothing words and psionic undertones. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier). On a failed save, the creature’s mental defenses are weakened. Any Insight or Persuasion checks you (or your allies) make to change the creature’s attitude or extract information have advantage for the next hour. If the creature was hostile, its attitude shifts to indifferent. However, this power cannot force compliance; it only reduces their mental resistance.
